parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.75

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapon Pool

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return number of weapons of type name in weapon pool (used in campaign to transfer weapons into next mission).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>  [[Number]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''queryWeaponPool''' name

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> name: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value><ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>_num=queryWeaponPool "M16"</inner><close></pre></close></ext>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[queryItemsPool]]
</value></part></template>
